responses: You can check your balance through net banking or by visiting an ATM.

patterns: I want to open an account
How to open a new account?
responses: You can open a new account online or by visiting your nearest branch.

patterns: Can I apply for a loan?
responses: We offer personal loans with interest rates starting at 11%. Would you like help with applying?
Please call our 24x7 helpline or block your card via our mobile app.
You can activate net banking by using your registered mobile number and visiting our portal.
Our branch hours are from 9 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Friday.
